data.title: flip sprites in combined sequences
data.body:
allow to use frames: in Combined: sequences plus allow flip or mirror sprites in sequences.
needed for dune2 mod

data.title: Fix replay freeze 2
data.body:
Depends on #9389. The extra commit fixes style and also implements the check suggested in  https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/9389#issuecomment-150823608 which ensures the replay for the user who disconnected ends at the right time and doesn't just keep going.

(I think @Herve-M would like their PR to count to hacktoberfest, so it would be nice to merge that PR and rebase this one, rather than closing the original)

data.title: RA mod on OSX Crashes
data.body:
Hello OpenRa keep crashing when you try to use RA mod.
The first time you launch it it works but i you relaunch the game it crashes. Log below (it happenes with mono 3.x and 4.x, OSX 10.8 and 10.10)7 If you remove the mod and install it again it works until restart. Error log is always the same and pints to hbox.e1:
Exception.log

```
Red Alert Mod at Version playtest-20150808
Operating System: OSX (Unix 14.5.0.0)
Runtime Version: Mono 4.0.4 ((detached/d481017) CLR 4.0.30319.17020
Exception of type `System.NotImplementedException`: No rules definition for unit hbox.e1
  at OpenRA.Actor..ctor (OpenRA.World world, System.String name, OpenRA.Primitives.TypeDictionary initDict) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.World.CreateActor (Boolean addToWorld, System.String name, OpenRA.Primitives.TypeDictionary initDict) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

  at OpenRA.Mods.Common.Traits.SpawnMapActors.WorldLoaded (OpenRA.World world, OpenRA.Graphics.WorldRenderer wr) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.World.LoadComplete (OpenRA.Graphics.WorldRenderer wr) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.StartGame (System.String mapUID, WorldType type) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.LoadShellMap () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Mods.Common.LoadScreens.BlankLoadScreen.StartGame (OpenRA.Arguments args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.InitializeMod (System.String mod, OpenRA.Arguments args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Initialize (OpenRA.Arguments args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Run (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Main (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
```

Debug.log

```
Failed to load rules for OpenRA Shellmap with error Cannot locate type: DefaultShellmapScriptInfo
Found 31 domains on map OpenRA Shellmap.
Found 5 domains on map OpenRA Shellmap.
```

data.title: Change aircraft's maximum pitch in TD to match the increased cruise altitude
data.body: Without this change, the C17 would not manage to get all the way down to the airfield's level, leading to a sudden drop in height, seemingly teleporting down to ground level.

data.title: Add replaybrowser yaml file back to d2k manifest.
data.body: #9744 was removing stuff from d2k's mod.yaml a little too enthusiastically.

data.title: Added filter to only register first key press
data.body: Fix for #9737. Currently holding keyboard short cut keys triggers every key repeat, this changes to only register on physical key press.

data.title: Fix unit production in soviet06
data.body: Fix an oversight introduced by #9754

data.title: Attempt to reduce SpreadDamageWarhead CPU overhead
data.body:
I'm not sure how large the total positive effect on performance is (assuming there is any), but I think this is worth testing.

This basically does ~two~ three things:
- removes the 2% and 1% stages from default `Falloff`. For the majority of weapons in RA, TD and TS these stages resulted in zero damage or 1 damage point against most actors anyway, while D2k now gets its own, custom Falloffs. This reduces situations where infantry would go prone due to a single damage point, and effectively reduces the default radius that is scanned for victims from 6x to 4x `Spread`, reducing the average number of iterated actors and number of 1-damage-point `Health.InflictDamage` ops.
- `hitActors` now only enumerates actors with `HealthInfo`, which avoids iterating over and performing a pointless `DoImpact` on invulnerable actors without `Health` trait (which might actually yield significant savings when weapons with large area of effect - like nukes - are fired into an area with lots of rocks or invulnerable trees etc., but for now that's just a guess).
- reduces default `TargetExtraSearchRadius` to largest feasible health radius on any shipping mod (1c512). A larger scan radius will only be needed when we increase health radii / health boxes, and only on weapons with relatively low area of effect.

data.title: Fix TD SAM sites not closing after killing a target.
data.body:
This will only work when the target was killed, or when you tell the SAM to stop.

This fix will not make the SAM close if the target is still alive and got out of range. There's a separate issue for that: #6185.

Fixes #7926.

data.title: Group selection excludes mcv
data.body: Selecting a group of units that has a mcv, will always exclude the mcv. I dunno if it's supposed to behave like this but I've noticed it while working on the soviet06 missions.

data.title: Fix harvesters teleporting through doors
data.body:
The `Harvester` trait has an `INotifyBlockingMove` implementation that cancels the activity queue if the current activity is `Wait`.  This interacts badly with the weapons factories in TD and TS, which make the units wait while the door opens.  On current bleed cancelling the wait and queued MoveIntoWorld makes the units instantly teleport to the exit cell, before continuing on.  This isn't visible in RA or D2K because they don't define production waits.

This works around the issue by making the production wait uncancellable.

data.title: Add ActorsHavingTrait<TTrait>()
data.body:
Gets actors (distinct) that have trait `TTrait` - won't repeat actor if it has multiple occurrences of `TTrait`.
Should be equivalent to `ActorsWithTrait<TTrait>().Select(tp => tp.Actor).Distinct()` except probably faster with less allocation.

data.title: Fix #9751 - Replace Selectable with CustomSelectionSize on RA barrels
data.body:
This still allows targeting them, but you neither see their health bar on mouse-over, nor can you select them (effectively making their health bar and selection box invisible).

Fixes #9751.

data.title: Add myself to AUTHORS
data.body: Cause I haven't done this yet after submitting 5 missions.

data.title: Made Dune 2000 corpses vanish faster
data.body: This hides the glitch from https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/7520 a bit better by playing the animation faster and keeping the blood splattering on top of the vehicle for a shorter amount of time.

data.title: Added a minimal debug text overlay for UI without chat
data.body:
Closes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/9508.

Background: actually there is a way to take a screenshot. The hotkey `CTRL` + `P` works, but there was no debug text giving feedback. This adds the missing debug text to the main menu and map editor.

data.title: Convert Lua array-like structures to use named entries.
data.body: Based on my comments in #9657 about the Lua code using ad-hoc arrays to store structured data.

data.title: Improve some actor queries
data.body: Use ActorsWithTrait if possible to avoid querying all actors in the world.

data.title: Busted vehicle blocking the war factory
data.body: Unit production stops when there is a burning vehicle at the gate.

data.title: Barrel healthbars should not be visible
data.body: This feels really unpolished on missions like allies02 with display all health bars enabled.

data.title: Paradrop drops dude outside map top left
data.body:
Noticed this behaviour in a couple of RA games lately in the latest release (release-20150919).

![gif](http://i.imgur.com/RgyoSLB.gif)

See actor 819 being spawned in top left corner outside map when the paradrop (top right in GIF) is dropping dudes. Also notice the dude who is outside the map is shooting the MCV.

The dude is spawned by the paradrop code as shown below. Breakpoint being hit by actor 819.

![Image](http://i.imgur.com/YoHSGkm.png)

Hopefully is this is some usefull information.

(The actor IDs being shown is just some local debug code I wrote a long time ago to aid debugging)
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/27670431-paradrop-drops-dude-outside-map-top-left?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Fix TOCTOU issues when calling Game.RunAfterDelay
data.body:
Since the action runs after a delay, the state of the game may no longer be the same and it may no longer be valid to run the action. Anything that references the world now calls IsCurrentWorld to ensure the world hasn't changed or been disposed.

Fixes #9741.

data.title: Add a lint pass for map format/author/title.
data.body: Inspired by #9420 and others.  It doesn't make any sense for a map to not define a title or author, so this will flag the maps when they are uploaded to the resource center.

data.title: Make SNIPER available for France
data.body: As suggested on [Sleipnir's Stuff](http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&p=292926#292926).

data.title: Revert missile explosion condition to strictly less than zero
data.body:
Makes broken submarine torpedos work again.

https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/9646#issuecomment-150830239

data.title: Add difficulty settings to soviet06 missions
data.body: Reinforcements can be stopped by destroying the radar dome. Destroying the radar dome is marked as a secondary objective.

data.title: Redesign the MP server browser.
data.body:
![rtk6npk](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/167819/10710873/3b7f9032-7a62-11e5-8aa9-a4efc5cde590.png)

Now displays up to 10 games at a time (up from three) and streamlines the flow for direct connect and creating servers.

Closes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/9451.

data.title: Fix RA-uibits dependency in D2k and TS
data.body: Copies ui elements to D2k and TS instead of loading them from RA.

data.title: soviet 06a and 06b name too long for map editor browser
data.body:
The name problem has been solved for the mission browser but still remains for the map browser of the editor:

![file_length](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4711816/10710100/e049de34-7a48-11e5-8050-5e6bb431016b.png)

data.title: Disposed actor trait lookup when leaving a replay.
data.body:
It looks like the `IGameOver` query from `world.EndGame()` is being run after the world has been disposed.  Possibly a regression from #9288?

```
Exception of type `System.InvalidOperationException`: Attempted to get trait from destroyed object (world 0 (not in world))
  at OpenRA.TraitDictionary.CheckDestroyed (OpenRA.Actor actor) [0x00026] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Game//TraitDictionary.cs:85 
  at OpenRA.TraitDictionary.WithInterface[IGameOver] (OpenRA.Actor actor) [0x00002] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Game//TraitDictionary.cs:101 
  at OpenRA.Actor.TraitsImplementing[IGameOver] () [0x0000d] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Game//Actor.cs:229 
  at OpenRA.World.EndGame () [0x0001b] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Game//World.cs:54 
  at OpenRA.Mods.Common.Traits.MissionObjectives+<CheckIfGameIsOver>c__AnonStorey0.<>m__0 () [0x0000c] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Mods.Common//Traits/Player/MissionObjectives.cs:153 
  at OpenRA.Primitives.ActionQueue.PerformActions (Int32 currentTime) [0x0008b] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Game//Primitives/ActionQueue.cs:52 
  at OpenRA.Game.LogicTick () [0x0000d] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Game//Game.cs:512 
  at OpenRA.Game.Loop () [0x000d4] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Game//Game.cs:644 
  at OpenRA.Game.Run () [0x00042] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Game//Game.cs:684 
  at OpenRA.Program.Run (System.String[] args) [0x00011] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Game//Support/Program.cs:117 
  at OpenRA.Program.Main (System.String[] args) [0x00050] in /Users/paul/src/OpenRA/OpenRA.Game//Support/Program.cs:39
```
